akn:section.akn:heading: Requirement of submission of application containing certain agreements and assurances

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary may not make payments under section 300ee–11(a) of this title for a fiscal year unless—

(b) Opportunity for public comment The Secretary may not make payments under section 300ee–11(a) of this title for a fiscal year unless the State involved agrees that, in developing and carrying out the description required in subsection (a), the State will provide public notice with respect to the description (including any revisions) and will facilitate comments from interested persons.
